item.title: Model to answer your questions rather than modelling reality
Coding: Implicit vs Explicit modeling
item.description: When it comes to object modeling there seem to be two distinct approaches that I have come across. The first approach is where we do what I like to think of as implicit modeling. With this approach we would probably use less objects than in the explicit approach and we would have objects being populated as we moved through the work flow of our application. I call it implicit modeling because we need to imply where we are based on the internal state of our objects- we can typically work this out by seeing what is and is not set to null.
